product.name: Cambria® Designer Series - Premium 7 foot Custom Double Curtain Rod - 1-1/8 inch Large Diameter - Non-Adjustable for a Seamless Look - Premium Designer Brackets and End Caps - Matte Graphite Finish
product.description:
Luxury custom curtain rod design and quality; all metal large diameter rods, rings with nylon inserts, and designer inspired brackets.
Custom fixed length, non-adjustable premium rods deliver a solid rod look and feel with no sagging or visible seams.
Enhance your layered window designs, our double drapery rod set includes a 1-1/8" rod and 5/8" rod in all sizes and finishes.
Enhance any window treatment style, pinch pleat, back tab, grommet or the many other options. Unleash your inner designer.
Designer Rings - 2"
Designer Rings - 1-3/8"
Designer Rod - 3 Feet
Designer Rod - 5 Feet
Designer Rod - 5 Feet
Designer Rod - 12 Feet
product.bullet_points:
• High Quality, Heavy Metal Construction: Cambria Designer Series sets the standard for luxury double curtain rod design and quality; with 0.6 mm sturdy 1-1/8 inch front and 5/8 inch rear large diameter metal rods, designer inspired brackets that support the heaviest of window treatments (up to 60 lbs)
• Seamless Fixed Length Custom Design: Avoids the sag and slide typical to adjustable curtain rods; Cambria Designer Series custom fixed length, non-adjustable premium double rods enhance the beauty of any decorative layered window design, rods are combinable to handle even the widest windows with no sagging or visible seams
• Easy Installation: Our designer inspired metal wall brackets provide a solid three anchor wall mount - versus typical two anchor mount - are fully adjustable, fully concealed mounting plate and anchors, easy to mount to any wall; combining multiple rods for wider windows is as easy as screwing them together with the included connecting screws
• Cambria Designer Finishes: Our opulent electroplated brushed, satin and matte finishes are of the highest quality to compliment and enhance any room; all Cambria Designer Series include a complete double rod set with premium all metal designer brackets, mounting hardware and end caps, customize your look with matching curtain rings (sold separately)
• The Benchmark for Luxury Curtain Rods: Cambria has set the standard in Decorative Window Hardware and is the industry leader for over 30 years, the Cambria Designer Series offers Custom Decorator features at an affordable price without sacrificing quality or style
